info.title: Fleet Telematics API
info.description: This is an API to our Fleet Telematics functionality

get.summary: Returns a stream of telematics events
get.description: This will return the up to 50 events at a time. If the last_event_id is not given as a query parameter, this will start at event 1. The object that is returned will have a boolean flag that indicates if there are more events available if the event ID is incremented. Events will be stored in the stream for up to 90 days.

parameters.name: last_event_id
parameters.description: If this value is given, this will filter the results to start at the event after the last event ID

additional_events.description: This will be true if there are more events to process
